page.title: 15CAROL'S LAMB
page.content: I live on a farm in Hinstock. My dad's friend knows Lord Shrewsbury and he has a lot of sheep and lambs. My dad asked Roy to look for a lamb. Then one Tuesday he brOUGHT a lamb. When we had her I think she was 2 days old. The first time we stroked her coat it was tough and rough. Then when we went to see her she was covered in a bunch of prickles, blackberry leaves,sticks, and goose grass all over her head. When it first rained on her I put a cover over her but dad said don't because it will make her ill and that she's got oils in her wool to stop it going to her skin. I love my lamb very much though she can be a pest sometimes.
